methods.name: open
methods.parameters: int id=-1
methods.short:
open the connection and start grabbing images

set the id to choose a kinect, see numAvailableDevices() if you don't set the id (ie id=-1), the first available kinect will be used

note: this is the freenct bus id and may change each time the app is run

methods.name: open
methods.parameters: string serial

methods.name: setCameraTiltAngle
methods.parameters: float angleInDegrees

methods.name: setDepthClipping
methods.parameters: float nearClip=500, float farClip=4000

methods.name: setLed
methods.parameters: ofxKinect::LedMode mode
methods.short: set the current led color and/or blink mode, only applied while the kinect is open

methods.name: setRegistration
methods.parameters: bool bUseRegistration=false
methods.short:
calibrates the depth image to align with the rgb image, disabled by default

call this before open(), has no effect while the connection is running

note: this calculation uses some cpu, leave off if not needed

methods.name: setUseTexture
methods.parameters: bool bUse
methods.short: enable/disable frame loading into textures on update()

methods.name: threadedFunction
methods.short: thread function

methods.name: update
methods.short:
updates the pixel buffers and textures

make sure to call this to update to the latest incoming frames
